title: Речная сказка
overview: Cosmetologist Alina Svetlova comes to a sanatorium outside the city to recover from a prolonged bout of bronchitis. And immediately finds herself a suspect in the murder of her ex, Dmitry. Trying to hide the evidence, she crosses paths with former detective Mikhail. Alina must solve the murder case and decide whether to trust Mikhail. He helps her, but he seems to have his own interests…
